name: The Sewer Incident
description:
This is my entry to the HPS1 SOS 2021 Game Jam! 

This project is pretty much a testing environment for making a rail shooter so I can have a code base to work from in the future. Nonetheless I hope that this very short experience will manage to be somewhat enjoyable for you.  Thanks for visiting this page. 

Mouse 1 to shoot, Mouse 2 to reload.

Feedback welcome : )         Bugs may be present.

Minor Lore
A terrorist organisation has been working in the shadows deep under the noses of the authorities plotting to bring destruction to the world above. An elite agent has been sent in to deal with the threat.
